name: Tennis - Intermediate Live Ball
description: Rough day at work? Want to get in a good fun tennis game drill session? Then join tennis intermediate live ball. No instruction, just fun games for intermediate players. This is not a beginner’s class.
fullDescription: Rough day at work? Want to get in a good fun tennis game drill session? Then join tennis intermediate live ball. No instruction, just fun games for intermediate players. This is not a beginner’s class.
whatTheyOffer: Rough day at work? Want to get in a good fun tennis game drill session? Then join tennis intermediate live ball. No instruction, just fun games for intermediate players. This is not a beginner’s class.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
